page.title: 14PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: {OLIVER TWIST.}Any number of people can play.You need a wall and a hard surface.It can go on as long as you wish.The rules are that you have to throw the ball at the wall 10 times The first time you touch your tongue then touch your shoe,knee,ground,pick up sticks,jump to heaven, through the gate,draw a line, start again. {ONE,TWO,THREE IN}Two or more people can play.You need a counting post and some hiding places.The game can take from one minute to about half an hour. One person counts to a hundred and the other people go and hide.When the counter is up to one hundred, he/ she goes and tries to find them.When he/she finds a person they both run to the counting post and the counter says "I see (Carol) behind the (tree)". Then the first person to be found is it,but if the last person
